summary: This is an email complaint from an anonymous victim/attorney to the U.S. Attorney's office, alleging a 15+ year conspiracy involving identity theft, financial fraud, and human/sex trafficking of herself and her children. She claims involvement by Ghislaine Maxwell, Jeffrey Epstein, a network of corrupt attorneys and judges, and connections to the Kardashian family. The document details personal abuse, fraud across multiple institutions, and a belief her identity is linked to a missing child case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Alleged leader of a ring involved in identity theft, financial fraud, and human trafficking against the complainant. Claimed to have been seen in the complainant's building in December 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Allegedly part of a group trafficking the complainant and her children. His estate and heritage are mentioned as targets of fraud by the conspirators.

persons.name: Jeff Berke
persons.context: Named as a corrupt attorney involved in the conspiracy against the complainant, allegedly working with others to change her name and defraud her.

persons.name: Nick Donovan
persons.context: Named as a corrupt attorney who allegedly facilitated Epstein and Maxwell's financial transactions using the complainant's identity, concealed her identity in government systems, and was involved in human trafficking.

persons.name: Martha Bursios
persons.context: Mentioned as a case from 2015 involving fiduciary stealing. The complainant claims to have seen her following her in December 2019 and alleges she is part of Maxwell's sex trafficking ring.

persons.name: Judge Cipotolla
persons.context: A Nassau family court judge accused of corruption, allegedly conspiring with Jeff Berke to issue orders against the complainant to enable her children's abuse.

persons.name: Judge Goldstien
persons.context: A New York City family court judge accused of corruption for granting visitation to an allegedly abusive father despite evidence of sexual abuse.

persons.name: Albert Nasser
persons.context: An Israeli citizen whose attorney, Allan Lassarus, is alleged to have illegally changed the complainant's name. Accused of sexually harassing the complainant and stealing a building from her.

persons.name: Bruce Gottsman
persons.context: An attorney introduced to the complainant by a notary. She sent him a revocation to eliminate damages during the investigation.

persons.name: Gianluca Croce
persons.context: The notary who notarized the complainant's marriage certificate and mailed it to Italy. She requests all documents from him.

persons.name: Serge Hoyda
persons.context: Owner of H& S equities from Great Neck. Involved in properties on Manhattan's lower east side with an offshore shell company. Allegedly part of the fraud group.

persons.name: Benjamin Netanyahu
persons.context: The complainant claims Netanyahu and his wife Sara know her personally and her case, having hosted her and her father in 2001. Suggests his office has a report on her identity.

persons.name: Sara Netanyahu
persons.context: Allegedly knows the complainant's ex-husband personally and acted as her "girl friend." Met with the complainant in New York in 2006-2007.

persons.name: Kim Kardashian
persons.context: Allegedly helped Maxwell use the complainant's identity and is rumored to have used her eggs for conception. Mentioned in connection to financial deals like the Cory Inc. purchase.

persons.name: Kylie Jenner
persons.context: Mentioned in connection to the $600 million purchase of Cory Inc., which the complainant implies is linked to fraud involving her identity.

persons.name: Allan Lassarus
persons.context: Attorney for Albert Nasser, alleged to have illegally changed the complainant's name at Chase Bank.

persons.name: Linda Donovan
persons.context: Allegedly used the complainant's confidential information to facilitate Epstein and Maxwell's transactions and file bad character reports.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The recipient of this email complaint, the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Irina Svetnikova
persons.context: A case worker who opened a complaint in the tax offset unit regarding child support payments.

persons.name: Alla Pirogovskaya
persons.context: Mentioned in the same context as Irina Svetnikova regarding an appeal in the first appellate division banking.

persons.name: Yair Levi
persons.context: An Israeli businessman, along with Serge Hoyda and Frank Calabresse, allegedly in a business relationship with the complainant's ex-husband.

persons.name: Frank Calabresse
persons.context: A businessman allegedly in a business relationship with the complainant's ex-husband.

persons.name: Professor Shimoni
persons.context: A doctor at Tel Hashomer hospital in Israel accused of fraud in matching bone marrow between the complainant and her non-biological brother, which she claims is an attempted murder.

persons.name: Baruch Gottsman
persons.context: Referred by the complainant's ex-husband for an annulment. She requests documents from him regarding transactions involving her rights.

connections.description: Described as part of the same group involved in human trafficking and financial fraud against the complainant.
Donovan allegedly facilitated Epstein and Maxwell's financial transactions using the complainant's identity and helped conceal her identity.
Berke is alleged to be part of the group, along with Donovan, facilitating fraud and human trafficking for Maxwell.
The complainant alleges Maxwell enjoys a close relationship with the Kardashian sisters, who helped use her identity.
The complainant claims she saw Berke talking with Judge Cipotolla to convince her to issue an order against her in 2015.
Both are attorneys alleged to have used the complainant's confidential information to benefit Epstein and Maxwell.
Lassarus is identified as the attorney for Albert Nasser.
Married couple, both alleged to know the complainant and her ex-husband personally.

events.title: Maxwell sighting at complainant's building
events.description: The complainant alleges she saw Ghislaine Maxwell in her apartment building elevator lobby in December 2019, giving her and her husband a strong look.

events.title: Maxwell's property purchase under alias
events.description: It was published that Maxwell bought a new house with cash under a created LLC, allegedly using the name 'Jane Mechella'.

events.title: Financial accounts emptied
events.description: The complainant states that around the end of January/February 2020, her accounts were emptied, leaving her with no money for food.

events.title: Brother hospitalized
events.description: The complainant's brother was hospitalized in Israel. She believes this was not due to illness but part of a fraud scheme to force a bone marrow transplant.

events.title: Flight to Austria with impersonator
events.description: The complainant believes a woman used her identity on a flight to Austria to transfer rights.

events.title: Flight from London to NY with impersonator
events.description: The complainant believes a woman used her identity on a flight from London to New York.

events.title: Martha Bursios case
events.description: Martha Bursios was involved in a 2015 case at the DA of Queens for fiduciary stealing from a sister, receiving a 5-year sentence. Released in 2019.

events.title: Family court petition for daughter
events.description: The complainant filed a petition in New York City family court to protect her daughter from her father's alleged sexual harassment. The case was referred to Nassau but not pursued.

keyFacts: The complainant, an attorney, alleges she and her three children have been victims of a 15-year conspiracy involving sex trafficking, identity theft, and financial fraud by a network including Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
She claims corrupt attorneys (Jeff Berke, Nick Donovan), judges (Goldstien, Cipotolla), and business associates (Albert Nasser) facilitated the abuse and fraud, using her identity for financial gain.
The complainant alleges she saw Ghislaine Maxwell in her apartment building in December 2019, shortly before Maxwell's arrest, and links this to irregularities in her bank accounts.
She believes her identity is connected to a missing baby case and that there are two Social Security files under her name, one of which is used by imposters.

The complaint involves international elements, alleging connections to Israeli figures (including Prime Minister Netanyahu) and fraud schemes in Israel, Austria, and the Virgin Islands related to Epstein's estate.
